summary: Test module that validates the HunyuanDiT diffusion pipeline through a collection of fast unit tests and an integration test. The tests cover component access, feed‑forward chunking, fused QKV projection handling, inference correctness for single and batched inputs, checkpoint save/load with optional components, and CPU offloading behavior, as well as a full‑scale integration check using the 1024‑parameter model configuration.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the HunyuanDiT pipeline within the diffusion framework, enabling reliable deployment and further development of text‑to‑image generation capabilities.
